GSP33yaatsi_u:165: sparśaviśeṣatayā padārthavidbhirabhyupagamācca / dṛśyasya dehasya kathaṃ draṣṭṛtvamiti cet ; ko virodhaḥ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:166: / ayameva yadekasyāṃ kriyāṃyāmekasya karmatvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ca na ghaṭata iti / yadyevam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:167: vyatirekavāde vā kathamātmani ahamiti pratyayaḥ / rūpabhedāditi cet,
GSP33yaatsi_u:168_0: samānamidaṃ dehātmavāde 'pi / api ca parasamavāyikriyāphalagāmi karma / svasamanetajñānaphalabhāginaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:168_1: śarīrasya karmatvameva nāstīti na paryanuyogāvakāśaḥ / ato deha evātmeti bārhaspatyāḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:171_1: ghaṭakībhūta ātmā dehādito vilakṣaṇaḥ svayaṃprakāśaḥ nityaḥ sūkṣmatayā sarvavyāptikṣamaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:171_2: pratiśarīraṃ bhinnaḥ ānandasvabhāva ityarthaḥ / dhīḥ - viṣayaprakāśakaṃ jñānamātmano
GSP33yaatsi_u:171_3: dharmabhūtam / tadādhāratvāttadvilakṣaṇatvam / ananyena svena sādhanaṃ siddhiḥ prakāśo
GSP33yaatsi_u:171_5: phalitam / svataḥ sukhī - svarūpata evānukūlaprakāśalakṣaṇasukhavān / sukhasvarūpa
GSP33yaatsi_u:173_1: pratyakṣaṃ hi mukhyaṃ pramāṇam / na ca tadatilaṅghanena kaścanārthaḥ sādhayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:173_2: pratyakṣaṃ ca sathaulyādiyoginaṃ dehameva jñātāramahamarthamātmānaṃ pratipādayatīti
GSP33yaatsi_u:173_6: śiṣṭaṃ spaṣṭam / pratyakṣātikrame doṣamāha 'itarathe'ti / pratyakṣamūlā hi vyavahārāḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:173_7: samupalabhyante paṇḍitapāmarasādhāraṇā arthakriyākārimo mukhyā eva / tadvirodhaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:173_8: pratyakṣātikrame prasajyata ityarthaḥ / nanu 'sthūlo 'haṃ jānāmī'ti pratītirbhrāntireva
GSP33yaatsi_u:173_9: pāmarāṇām / paṇḍitānāṃ tvaritiktātmagocaraivāhaṃ jānāmīti / ahaṃ sthūla iti tu vyavahāraḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:173_10: paṇḍitānāṃ lākṣaṇika ityāśaṅkāmanūdya pratikṣipati 'na cāya'miti / ayaṃ vyavahāro
GSP33yaatsi_u:174_3: tadavayavādiprakāśakatvamiti niyamo neti bhāvaḥ / sati niyame yatprasaktaṃ tadā 'yene'ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:174_5: jānāmīti / na tu śarīraṃ sāvayavamiti niyamaphalam / jñātṛtvapratyakṣaṃ śarīrāviṣayakam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:176: yathā ghaṭādi pratyakṣamityatra prayoge niruktaniyamasyopayogaḥ / niruktaniyamasyāsaṃbhave hetumāha
GSP33yaatsi_u:177_0: 'bāhye'ti / sahacāradṛṣṭerhi niyamavijñānam / sahacāraśca bāhyapratyakṣa eva dṛṣṭa
GSP33yaatsi_u:177_1: iti tadviṣaya eva niruktaniyama iti bhāvaḥ / nanu bhavatu sahacāradarśanaṃ bāhya
GSP33yaatsi_u:177_3: guṇo jñānasukhādiryogyaḥ / tadādhāratvamātreṇa dharmyavabhāsakatvaṃ manasaḥ / natu
GSP33yaatsi_u:177_5: manasā jñātṛtvamātreṇa śarīragraha iti pratyakṣasāmānye niyamo nopasaṃhartuṃ śakyata
GSP33yaatsi_u:177_6: iti bhāvaḥ / bāhyatve 'pi śarīrasya jñānādyuparāgoṇāntaratvamityabhimānaḥ / avayavigocarabāhyapratyakṣatvavyāpakaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:178_4: 'stviti cettatrāpi taṃ doṣamāha 'vāyośce'ti / sparśavattvamātreṇa vāyuspārśane tadavayavaviṣayakatvābhāvāttatra
GSP33yaatsi_u:178_5: vyabhicāro niruktaniyamasyeti bhāvaḥ / satyevāvadhāne vāyvavayavādigrahaḥ / anyadā
GSP33yaatsi_u:178_6: tu tvaksannikṛṣṭasya vāyoḥ sparśavattvenaivopalambha ityabhimānaḥ / ahañjānāmīti
GSP33yaatsi_u:178_9: iti śeṣaḥ / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - dravyagrāhīndriyasya yogyasannikṛṣṭatadguṇagrāhakatvamiti
GSP33yaatsi_u:179_0: dīnāṃ tadguṇānāmayogyatvānna manasā grahaḥ evaṃ dehātmavāde 'pi tadīyarūpāderayogyatvādeva
GSP33yaatsi_u:179_1: na manasā graha iti / na ca rūpavaddravyapratyakṣe rūpagrahaṇaṃ niyatamiti vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:179_2: ghaṭādisparśane 'naikāntyān / 'yathā tatre'ti / yathā tatra - atiriktātmavāde bāhyapratyakṣa
GSP33yaatsi_u:181_0: evamahaṃ jānāmīti pratyakṣasya dehaviṣayakatvaṃ samarthitam / anena dehacaitanyabādhakānumānānāṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:181_1: bādhitatvamāha 'evaṃ ce'ti / caitanyaṃ na śarīraviśeṣaguṇaḥ ākāraṇaguṇapūrvakatatvāt,
GSP33yaatsi_u:182_0: ayāvaddravyabhāvitvādvā saṃyogavaditi dehacaitanye bādhakamanumānam / tatra prathamahetorasiddhiṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:182_1: pariharati 'pratyeka'mityādinā / nanu paramāṇuṣu dehāraṃbhakeṣu caitanyaṃ māstu /
GSP33yaatsi_u:182_2: yenānekacetanaprasaṅga ekasmin dehe / akāraṇaguṇapūrvakaśca rūpādiḥ pākajo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:182_5: kāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvam / vyāpakanivṛttyā ca caitanye śarīraviśeṣaguṇatvasya nivṛttiriti
GSP33yaatsi_u:182_6: bhāvaḥ / dvitīyānumāne ca yo yaḥ kāryadravyaviśeṣaguṇaḥ sa sa yāvaddravyabhāvīti
GSP33yaatsi_u:182_7: sāmānyato vyatirekavyāptiḥ pīlupākanayena vācyā / 'ityādaya' ityādipadena caitanyaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:182_9: parākramituṃ kṣamantedehacaitanyaṃ bādhituṃ na pragalbhante / kutaḥ ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:184_0: saṃbhavati / prabala upajīvyatvena pratyakṣapramāṇabādhanaṃ ca durbalairetairanumānanairduṣkaramiti
GSP33yaatsi_u:184_2: caitanye śarīraguṇatvasyābhāvo na sādhayituṃ śakyata ityāśayenāha 'viśeṣe'ti / śarīra
GSP33yaatsi_u:184_4: kṣatiḥ / paribhāṣikaṃ hi viśeṣaguṇatvam / bhāvanānyo yo vāyuvṛttivṛttidharmasamavāyī
GSP33yaatsi_u:185_1: lāghavāditi bhāvaḥ / indriyavāttvādaya ityādipadena prāṇavattvaṃ grāhyam / icchānuvidhāyikriyatvaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:185_3: bhāvaḥ / śarīraṃ cetanāvat icchānuvidhāyikriyatvādindriyādimattvādvā yannaiva tannaivaṃ yathā
GSP33yaatsi_u:186_0: ghaṭādīti vyatirekānumānaṃ ca dehasya caitanye 'tra vākye garbhitam / kāryadravyaviśeṣaguṇatvasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:186_2: dantasaṅghaṭṭanaiḥ pūrvāvayavavināśe tadavayavānāṃ saṃśleṣaviśeṣato niṣpanne piṇḍitāvayavini
GSP33yaatsi_u:186_3: raktaṃ rūpamavayaveṣvavidyamānaṃ saṃśleṣaviśeṣata eva teṣāmutpannamiti tatra vyabhicāra
GSP33yaatsi_u:186_4: iti bhāvaḥ / ākṣipati 'carvaṇe'ti / dantasaṃmardaiḥ pūrvāvayavino vdyuṇukaparyantasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:186_6: kāraṇaguṇapūrvakameva piṇḍitāvayavini raktaṃ rūpamiti na vyabhicāra iti bhāva ākṣeptuḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:186_8: yathā haridrācūrṇe cūrṇakajalasaṃyogenaiva hi raktaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭam / tathātrāpi saṃbhavāt
GSP33yaatsi_u:187_0: iti bhāvaḥ / carvaṇasthale pīlupākenaiva rūpāntaramityāgrahe 'pi sthalāntare vyabhicāramāha
GSP33yaatsi_u:187_1: 'sitāsite'ti / na hi citrapaṭasthale 'vayaveṣu pākasaṃbhavaḥ / na cāvayaveṣu citraṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:187_3: citrarūpe 'naikāntyamiti bhāvaḥ / sājātyaṃ rūpatvādyavāntarajātyā vivakṣitam / na
GSP33yaatsi_u:187_4: hi nīlatantubhiḥ śuklapaṭāraṃbhaḥ / rūpatvādinā sājātyavivakṣāyāṃ tu tasyāpi prasaṅga
GSP33yaatsi_u:187_5: iti / nanu citraṃ nāma rūpāntaraṃ neṣyate / na caivaṃ nānārūpatantubhirārabdhaścintrapaṭo
GSP33yaatsi_u:187_7: vācyam / avayavarūpeṇaiva cākṣuṣatvopapattau citrapaṭasya nīrūpatve 'pi kṣativirahāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:187_12: kartuṃ na śakyata ityarthaḥ / citraḥ paṭa iti cābādhitapratītivyavahārataśritraṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:187_14: upeyate pratītibalāt / tathā ca na tatra vyabhicāra ityatrāha - 'viśeṣaguṇaśce'ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:187_17: tathā ca karakasparśe kāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvaniyamasya vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ / nanvavayavasaṃyogaviśeṣa
GSP33yaatsi_u:187_18: evāstu kāṭhinyam / tathā ca kkānaikāntyamityatrāha 'na ca saṃyoge'ti / avayavasaṃyogaviśeṣasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:187_19: kāṭhinyarūpatve tasyāvayavinyavṛtteḥ kaṭhinaḥ karaka iti pratītivyavahārau na syātām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:188: eveti sāmpratam / padārthavidbhiḥ kāṇādaiḥ sparśaviśeṣatayaiva ca tadabhyupagatamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:189_1: iti / viruddhārthe hi kathantā / draṣṭurdṛśyatve 'virodhātkā nāma kathanteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:189_2: virodhamāha 'ayameve'ti / tatkriyāyāṃ tadaiva kasyacitkartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ ca na yuktam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:189_3: kriyayā āptumiṣṭatamaṃ hi karma sādhyarūpam / kriyāśrayaḥ karttā ca siddharūpaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:189_4: siddhasādhyayornaikyaṃ saṃbhavatīti virodhaḥ kartṛkarmatvayoriti bhāvaḥ / ākṣepturmukhenaiva
GSP33yaatsi_u:191: tannyāyasya na dehātmavāde daṇḍanivāraṇamiti bhāvaḥ / vastuto yādṛśasya karmatvasya kartṛtvena virodhaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:192_0: na tādṛśaṃ jñānakarmatvam / ato 'pi na doṣa ityāha - 'api ca pare'ti / 'svasamavetajñānaphalabhāgini'
GSP33yaatsi_u:192_3: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - parasamavetakriyājanmaphalāśrayatvaṃ mukhyaṃ karmatvam / yathā grāmasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:192_5: karmatvaṃ viṣayatārūpamiti hi tārkikāṇāṃ samayaḥ / asya jñānakartaryapyupagamānnātmānaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:193: tu kartṛtvena virodha iti / nacāmukhyamidaṃ karmatvaṃ nānuśāsanasiddhamiti vācyam / 'karturīpsitatamaṃ karme'tyasyaiva tantreṇāsminnapi pramāṇatvopagamāt / kartuḥ jñātuḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:195_0: āptumiṣṭatamaṃ - jñātavyatvenābhimataṃ karmeti cātra pakṣe 'kṣarārtho vācyaḥ / aniṣṭasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:195_1: jñātasya tu 'tathā yuktaṃ cānīpsita'mityanenaiva kriyāyuktaṃ - jñānena viṣayatayā
GSP33yaatsi_u:196_1: 'pi tadāśrayatvābhāvānna viṣayasya mukhyaṃ karmatvam / ātmanaḥ svavyavahārāśrayatve
GSP33yaatsi_u:196_3: tu viṣayasya ghaṭāderjñānakarmatvaṃ mukhyaṃ syānnāma / adhikamarge vakṣyāmaḥ / samarthitaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:196_5: aiśvaryamahimakṣayāyāsurāṇāṃ vaidikaścaddhāvilopakaṃ mohakaṃ tantraṃ nirmitaṃ suraguruṇāsurendrānunayavivaśeneti
GSP33yaatsi_u:196_6: ca prasiddhiḥ / dehasyaiva caitanye tatsūtraṃ pramāṇayati 'tathā ce'ti / pṛthivyādīti
GSP33yaatsi_u:196_7: catvāryeva bhūtāni tattvāni / taiḥ saṃhatya niṣpādite dehe pratyekamasadapi caitanyamudbhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:196_8: kiṇvādibhyo niṣpādite surādravya ivāpūrvā madaśaktiriti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:199_1: ghaṭāderiva / parāgvṛttiridamiti śarīraviṣayiṇī ca śemuṣī svaviṣayamahaṅkāragocarādvivecayati
GSP33yaatsi_u:199_2: yathāyaṃ ghaṭa iti / itarathā svaparavibhāgānupapatteḥ / na caikasminneva rūpabhedādevaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:199_3: pratītiḥ / na hi devadatto daṇḍinamātmānaṃ daṇḍyayamiti pratyeti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:201_1: na bhāsante / svathīyasi cāvayavini śarīre 'hamiti matigocare 'bhyupagabhyamāne 'vaśyamavayavapratibhāsenāpyanvayinā
GSP33yaatsi_u:201_2: bhāṣyam / na hyāsti saṃbhavaḥ - avayavī sthavīyān pracakāsti ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:202: avayavāstu na kecana prathanta iti / yattu tryaṇuke vyabhicāra iti ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:204_1: tathā pratibhāsaniyamādvā na vyabhicāraḥ / na cāvayavini bahirandriyagrāhya evāyaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:204_2: niyama ityutprekṣyam / pramāṇābhāvāt / antaḥkaraṇasya ca kevalasyāvayavini vṛttyasambhavācca /
GSP33yaatsi_u:204_4: 'styeva spṛśyamāna iva ghaṭādāviti na tena vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:205: yattu sthūlo 'haṃ kṛśo 'hamiti śarīre 'haṃpratyayo dṛśyata iti ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:206: tadapi paryālocanīyam / tatrāpyantaḥśarīramahamākārameva kimapi vastu ahaṅkāro gocayati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:207_0: na punaścākṣuṣa iva dehapratyayaḥ sthaulyabālyādiyogidehamātram / ata eva mamedaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:207_1: gṛhamitivāt mamedaṃ śarīramiti bhedapratibhāso vyavahāraśca / na hyasau sākṣātpratītabhedanimittaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:207_3: tatrā'tmaśabdasyātmani vṛttairaikārthyādavivādācca yuktaṃ tathā'śrayaṇam / na caivamatra /
GSP33yaatsi_u:207_4: ato dehavyatirekiṇaḥ cetanasya pratyakṣasiddhatvāccatsaṃbandhini lākṣaṇiko dehe 'haṃśabdaprayogaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:208_2: itaśca - icchānuvidhāyisvavyāpāro 'yamātmā / icchayaiva hi saṅkalpayati smaratyabhyūhati
GSP33yaatsi_u:209: śuktirajatādāviva / praṇihitamanasastu jñātṛtayā siddhyantamahamākāramarthamanavayavamidamiti parisphurataḥ sthūlādavayavinaḥ śarīrāt pṛthagaparokṣayantyeva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:210: bhavanti ca - jānāmīti pratyayaḥ śarīraviṣayo na bhavati ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:216: mataṃ śarīrajñānam / tathā - śarīramahaṃpratyayagocaro na bhavati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:221_0: bādhakapramāṇam / bādho vā / upanyasyata iti śeṣaḥ / 'pratyakṣabādhataḥ' iti / idantvena
GSP33yaatsi_u:221_2: etadevopapādayati 'na khalu' iti / ahamidaṅkārau - ahamidaṃpratyayau / svātmagocaro 'haṃpratyayaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:222_0: svānyagocaraścedaṃpratyayaḥ ekasya puṃsa ekasminnevārthe na ghaṭata ityarthaḥ / vivṛṇotyetat
GSP33yaatsi_u:222_2: parāgvṛttiḥ ātmānyaviṣayā / ahaṅkāragocarāt - ahaṃpratyayaviṣayāt svātmanaḥ / śiṣṭaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:222_4: ayaṃbhāvaḥ - ahamiti svasmai bhāsamānaḥ pratyagarthaḥ svātmā / svasmā idantvenaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:222_5: bhāsamānaśca parāgarthaḥ para iti svaparavibhāgo hi ahamidaṃbuddhiśabdābhyāmeva nirūpyaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:222_6: arthavailakṣaṇyābhāve tayorayaṃ na ghaṭata iti / ahamarthasyaiva bhavatvākārāntareṇa
GSP33yaatsi_u:223: nanvayamahasmītyādipratyayo bhavatyeva svātmani / satyam / tatrāpapīdaṃśabdena parāgrūpadharmollekhaḥ / ātmasvarūpasyollekho 'hamiti / tathā ca pratyagvṛttirahaṅkāraḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:225_0: nanu mamedaṃ vapuriti mamāyamātmetivatsyādityarucerāha 'anyecce' ti / hetvantaraṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:226_1: bhāvaḥ / avahitamanasaḥ - ātmagrahaṇedaṃparamanasaḥ / avayataḥ - jānataḥ / sthavīyān
GSP33yaatsi_u:226_2: - atiśayena sthūlaḥ / pratyakṣagrāhyāvayavasamaveta iti vivakṣitam / avayavigrahamasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:226_6: iti bhāvaḥ / paramāṇukalpanāmupagamyāpyāha 'pratyakṣe'ti / pratyakṣayogyā avayavā yasya,
GSP33yaatsi_u:227_3: svīkāre bādhakopalambho hi bāhyatatpratyakṣamātraviṣayakatayā niyamasaṅkoce mānam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:227_4: tadabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ / nanu manasā kevalamavayavi gṛhyate vināvayavamityata eva niyamaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:227_7: bāhyārthe svāntasyāsvātantryamiti hi tārkikāḥ / ato na manasā śarīrasya grahaṇaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:227_8: ghaṭeta kevalena / caitanyavattvena tasyābāhyatvānmanasā grahaṇaṃ bavedvināvayaveneti
GSP33yaatsi_u:227_9: tu na kalpanīyam / taccaitanya eva vigānāditi bhāvaḥ / niruktaniyamasya vāyuspārśane
GSP33yaatsi_u:227_11: niyame naiva doṣaḥ nīrūpatvādvāyoḥ sparśavattvamātreṇa tasya spārśanopagame 'pīti
GSP33yaatsi_u:229: ghaṭaspārśana iva ghaṭāvayavasyeti bhāvaḥ / dehātmatvasādhikāṃ pratyakṣapratītaṃ 'yattuṃ' ityādinānūdya samādhatte 'tadapī'tyādinā / śarīrāntarvartamānamahamākāram - ahantālakṣaṇaṃ

GSP33yaatsi_u:315: rūpādijñānavaditi / tadevaṃ jñānakaraṇatayāvagatasya manasaḥ kathamiva jñāne kartṛtvam ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:317_0: svasamavetameva vā guṇāntaraṃ tantrīkṛtya pravṛttiḥ / karaṇatvaṃ tu parādhiṣṭhānādhīnavyāpāratārūpapāra
GSP33yaatsi_u:317_1: tantryaniyataṃ sādhakatamatvamiti kathamivaikatra manasi parasparaviruddha tadubhayadharmasaṃbandhaṃ pratipadyemahi ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:318: / atha tadapi manaḥ karaṇāntareṇa smaraṇādiṣu kartṛbhāvamanubhavati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:319: tathā sati saṃjñāmātre vivādaḥ / ya eva hi cakṣurādibhī rūpādin āntarakaraṇena ca sukhādīṃścetayate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:320: sa evā'tmā / tasminneva cet manaḥsaṃjñā niveśyate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:321: kāmaṃ niveśyatām / na naḥ kiñciddhīnam / kintu tadā sarvalaukikavyavahāro bādhyetetyalamanena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:324: / nanūktamāntaraṃ jñānakaraṇaṃ dravyamiti / kiṃ punarasya sādhanam ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:325: / nanuktaṃ yugapajjñānānutpattirmanaso liṅgamiti / uktaṃ nāma; tathāpi kathaṃ tattvāntarasiddhiḥ ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:326_1: santi hi yugapadasya smartṛrnānārthānubhavabhāvitāḥ saṃskārāḥ / atha ca na sarve
GSP33yaatsi_u:327_1: sarvataḥ pratyāhṛtacetasaḥ sādhāraṇyena praṇidadhayo 'pi na sarva evārthāḥ smṛtimadhirohanti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:329: ātmanaḥ ; tathā sati bahirindriyeṣu ca yathā
GSP33yaatsi_u:330: yathaṃ svaviṣayasaṃprayukteṣu tathaiva yugapajjñānānutpattirupapadyata iti kṛtamindriyāntareṇa /
GSP33yaatsi_u:331_1: bhāvyam / taccātmamanaḥ- sannikarṣa iti manodravyasiddhiriti / tadasat / sukhaduḥkhādipūrvakālajanmano
GSP33yaatsi_u:331_5: prayatnasya tu svapūrvakṣaṇavarti kartavyatājñānam / prayatna eva tvadṛṣṭasyāpīti
GSP33yaatsi_u:334: tadapi sthavīyaḥ / pārthivaparamāṇuṣu rūpādayo dahanasaṃyogāditi kṛto 'vagatam ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:336: iha vā tahri kiṃ na dṛśyate iṣṭāniṣṭaprāptyavagamānantaraṃ sukhādirjāyata iti ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:337: / dṛṣṭakāraṇavyabhicāre hi kāraṇāntarānumānāvasaraḥ / na cehāsti vyabhicāraḥ / ataḥ prasiddhakāraṇabhāveṣveva yatra kāryasamavāyaḥ tat samavāyikāraṇam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:339: yadanyat tannimittimiti vyavasthāśrayaṇamucitam / na tvanapekṣitāprasiddhadravyāntarasaṃyogābhyupagamena tasyāsamavāyikāraṇatvāśrayaṇam / kāraṇāntarānupalabdheḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:340: dṛṣṭānusārāccāṇugatarūpādau tathābhyupagamaḥ / iha tu tadviparyayaḥ pradārśita eva / evamapi vyāptibalena yadi dravyāntarasaṃyogo 'numātavyaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:341: sa tarhi sparśavaddravyasamaveto bhautika eva copalabdha iti prasiddhadehādisaṃyoga evānumānaparyavasānānna navama
GSP33yaatsi_u:343_0: athocyeta-bhautikatve hi manasaḥ pṛthivyādyanyatamatvena bhavitavyam / taccānumānāntarairvyatirekamāpādayadbhiḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:343_1: pratyāsiddham / tathā hi-na pārthivaṃ manaḥ rasāvagamanimittendriyatvādrasanāvat / na pāthasīyam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:346: hanta tarhi tadeva taditarabhūtavyatirekitayāpyavagatamiti na tadavagamakatāmātreṇābhimatavyatirekasiddhiḥ / api ca śabdādiguṇāvagamasādhāraṇasādhanatayā śarīramiva pāñcabhautikam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:347: ekadvitrādimayaṃ vā itarabhūtasaṃsṛṣṭamastu manaḥ / yathā'mnāyate annamayaṃ hi somya mana iti / tanna tatprakṛtitvapratipādanaparam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:348_0: apitu tadadhīnavṛttitāmātrapradarśanārtham āpomayaḥ prāṇaḥ ityādivat / ata evāpavargadaśāyāmapi
GSP33yaatsi_u:348_1: mano 'nuvṛttiḥ / darśitaṃ hi tatraivāṣṭame manasaitān kāmān paśyan ramate mano 'sya
GSP33yaatsi_u:348_2: daivaṃ cakṣuriti / tathā parasyāśca devatāyāḥ so 'nyaṃ kāmaṃ manasā dhyāyīteti mahopaniṣadi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:348_3: manasaiva jagatsṛṣṭimiti ca purāṇe / ucyate-satyamevam / dravyāntaraparikalpanāto
GSP33yaatsi_u:349: nāpi navamaṃ dravyam / kva tarhīdānīṃ manaḥśabdaḥ ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:350: / buddhāveva / ata eva hi buddhimān manasvīti vyapadiśyate / manaso 'vasthābhaidāśca drāgevāparokṣyante kṣubhitaṃ me manaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:351: prasannaṃ me mana iti / evaṃ ca manasaḥ karaṇatayā vyapadeśo buddhyahaṅkārayoriva vṛttibhedapradarśanaparaḥ pūrveṣāmiti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:359: gatvarasvābhāvyāt prāṇasya / itarathā paramamahato mahataśca sparśavirahiṇaḥ parispandānupapatterutkrāntigatyāgatiśrutayo bhāktāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:362: vāyutvādeva bāhyavāyuvat prāṇasya caitanyānupapatteḥ / vṛttihīne 'pyātmani suṣuptau prāṇasya vṛttimattvācca / tadvṛttyā hi suptasyāpi saptadhātubhāvenāśitapītadravyapariṇāmaḥ ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:363: śvāsapraśvāsau ca / tanutaratejobannānuviddhaḥ kauṣṭhyamāruto hi prāṇaḥ / sa ca kaṇṭhamukhanāsābhyantare bahiśca recitaḥ tvacā spṛśyamāno ghaṭādiriva sphuṭamanātmatayā cakāsti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:364_0: atraiva sādhye sādhanāntarāṇi cāha utpattimattvā dityādikārikādvayena / pārārthyaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:365_1: ātmatvaṃ sādhayatāṃ kevalavyatikeriṇām evam iti / anvayamukhena -anvayavyāptyā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:367: athendriyātmavādamupakṣipati santu tarhī ti / dehātmatvapakṣoktāni dūṣaṇāni
GSP33yaatsi_u:368: nātra pakṣe prasajyanta ityāha na ca tānī tyādivākyadvayena / bādhakābhāvamuktvā sādhakamapyāha pakṣe 'tra tavdyāpāre ti / jñānamindriyadharmaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:371: yathā snānādhyayanādivyāpāraphalaṃ śaucākṣararāśigrahaṇādi snātradhyetṛsamavetamiti prayogo bodhyaḥ / indriyasya vyāpāraḥ- arthasannikarṣārthendriyapravṛttiḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:372_0: arthenendriyasya sannikarṣa eva vā / hetau dravyabhinnabhāvatve satīti viśeṣaṇaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:372_2: kṣatiḥ / indriyātmatve 'numānamuktvā'ptavākyamapi saṃvādarūpaṃ nirdiśati ata eve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:373_0: indriyāṇāmātmatvaṃ nirasyati tanne ti / vikalpāsahatvaṃ nāma vikalpadharmiṇaḥ saṃbhāvitayāvatkoṭivikalpena
GSP33yaatsi_u:373_2: iti yāvat / pratyakṣabādhābhāve 'pi yauktikabādho 'stīndriyātmatva iti hārdam / pratyekendriyacaitanyapakṣe
GSP33yaatsi_u:373_3: nānāsvāmika iva grāma ekasminneva dehe nānācetanādhiṣṭānānnityakalahādi prasajyate
GSP33yaatsi_u:373_4: iti dūṣaṇaṃ hṛdi nādhāya dūṣaṇāntaramāha indriyāntare ti / indriyasaṅghātātmatvapakṣe
GSP33yaatsi_u:373_5: 'pīdaṃ sādhāraṇam / tadāha ata eve ti / ata eva - niruktapratisandhānānupapattereva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:374: nāpyanusmartā / tathā hi - saṅghāto yadi saṃyogo bahutvasaṅkhyā vā,
GSP33yaatsi_u:375: tarhi guṇatvādeva na jñātṛtvasaṃbhavaḥ / yadi saṃyuktānāṃ bahūnāmeva saṅghātatvena vivakṣā,
GSP33yaatsi_u:376_0: tadāpi na bahūnāmindriyāṇāṃ cākṣuṣāśrayatā spārśanāśrayatā vā / tathā ca draṣṭuḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:376_2: doṣāntaramāha ekendriye ti / saṅghātasya tāvataiva vinaṣṭatvānnirātmakatvena dehasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:376_4: ti / draṣṭuścakṣuṣo vināśe mayedaṃ dṛṣṭamiti smṛteranupapattiḥ / vidyamānasyādraṣṭṛtvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:377_0: bādhakānyuktāni / atha tatsādhakamanumānaṃ dūṣayati na ca tavyadyāpāre ti / pāpāderityādipadena
GSP33yaatsi_u:377_2: iti bhāvaḥ / atra vipakṣe bādhakavirahādaprayojakatvamapi bodhyam / atha satyatapaso
GSP33yaatsi_u:377_3: vacanaṃ karaṇe kartṛtvopacāreṇa pravṛttamanyaparaṃ nendriyacaitanye pramāṇamityāha
GSP33yaatsi_u:377_5: satyatapaso vacanam draṣṭuścakṣuṣo nāsti jihvā ityādi / etasminnarthe śloko 'yamanugṛhīto
GSP33yaatsi_u:377_6: 'smadgurucaraṇaiḥ yā paśyati na sā brūte sā na paśyati / dṛṣṭirvakti kathaṃ vyādha
GSP33yaatsi_u:377_7: vāṇī vā vīkṣate katham // iti / anena praṣṭā vyādha iti gamyate / akathane 'śanāyāpīḍitasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:378: kathane ca śaraṇāgataparityāganibandhanaṃ mahatpāpaṃ paryālocya evaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:380: atha mana ātmatvapakṣamupakṣipati astu tarhī ti / tadvī ti / mano hi pradhānāṃ sarvendriyaprerakaṃ ca gamyate pramāṇato,
GSP33yaatsi_u:381: vyavahliyate ca tathetyarthaḥ / indriyātmatvapakṣoktānāṃ smṛtipratisandhānānupapattinānātmaprasaṅgādidoṣāṇāṃ nātra pakṣe prasaṅga ityāha upapadyate ce tyādivākyadvayena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:382_0: manasa ātmatvaṃ dūṣayati tadapi ne ti / karaṇatvā diti sarvatra jñāne karaṇatvānmanaso
GSP33yaatsi_u:382_1: na tatra kartṛtvamāśrayatvaṃ saṃbhavati / mano hi na pratyakṣaviṣayaḥ / kintu yugapajjñānānutpattiliṅgena
GSP33yaatsi_u:382_2: sakalajñāne karaṇaviśeṣatayānumīyate / tasya ca na jñātṛtvaṃ cakṣurāderiva saṃbhavatīti
GSP33yaatsi_u:383_0: yatsannikarṣavirahāditi yāvat / tattadarthagrāhakendriyasyeti śeṣaḥ / evaṃ bāhyārtheṣu
GSP33yaatsi_u:383_2: āntarasukhādisākṣātkāreṣu karaṇatayāpi manaso 'numānamāha tathā sukhādī ti / nanu
GSP33yaatsi_u:384_0: diti cettatrāha tadevam iti / karaṇasya kartṛtvaṃ na saṃbhavati / karaṇatvakartṛtvayorvirodhāt
GSP33yaatsi_u:384_4: parasya ripsitakriyāniṣpattau prakṛṣṭopakārakatvalakṣaṇam / na caitayorekatra samāveśaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:384_5: saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ / yadyapi cetanasyaikatra kartṛtvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ ca saṃbhavennāmā'kārabhedataḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:384_6: athāpi manasaścaitanye dṛḍhatarapramāṇābhāvāt lokasiddhavyāptyā ca cakṣurādivatparasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:384_7: cetanasya sukhādyanubhavakaraṇatayaiva siddherna manaso jñātṛtvam / vastutastu atyantātīndriyeṣvartheṣu
GSP33yaatsi_u:384_8: śāstrameva pramāṇam / tataśca mano vijñānamayasya jīvasyopakaraṇatayaiva siddhyatīti
GSP33yaatsi_u:384_9: hārdam / nanu rūpasukhādibāhyāntarapadārthānubhaveṣu mana eva kartṛ / āntarasukhādyanubhave
GSP33yaatsi_u:384_10: karaṇaṃ tvāntaramanyatkalpyata iti śaṅkate atha tadapi ti / pariharati tathā satī
GSP33yaatsi_u:384_11: tī / evaṃ sati asmadiṣṭasya jñātaryantaḥ- karaṇabhedasya na kāpyanupapattiḥ / saṃjñā
GSP33yaatsi_u:384_12: tu aicchikīti nārthe vivāda ityarthaḥ / jñāturātmano manaḥsaṃjñāyāṃ vyavahāravirodhamāha
GSP33yaatsi_u:384_13: kintu iti / mana iti nātmano vyavahāro laukikānāṃ vaidikānāṃ ca / ato manaḥsaṃjñā'tmani
GSP33yaatsi_u:385_1: prakramate āhe ti / kaścidvimarśaka ityādiḥ / vimarśaścāyaṃ tārkikābhimatānāṃ manaḥsādhakayuktīnāṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:385_2: kṣodakṣamatvābhāvapradarśanārthaḥ / kimidam iti / kimiti svarūpapraśnaḥ / kiṃpunariti
GSP33yaatsi_u:385_3: pramāṇapraśnaḥ / manasi pramāṇamākṣipati uktaṃ nāme tyādinā /yugapajjñānānutpattiliṅgena
GSP33yaatsi_u:385_4: dravyāntaramāntaraṃ karaṇaṃ na siddhyati / adṛṣṭādisahakāraviraheṇaiva yugapajjñānānutpattyupapatteriti
GSP33yaatsi_u:386_2: smṛtihetutvāt / udbodhasya kramabhāvitvācceti bhāvaḥ / evamapī ti / praṇidhānaṃ-manaso
GSP33yaatsi_u:386_4: tadāpi na yāvadarthasmṛtayo yugapat jāyante / tatsatyapi nānārthasmṛtiṣu dṛṣṭakāraṇe
GSP33yaatsi_u:387_0: kintu ekasyaivaikadā bhavati smṛtiradṛṣṭasahakārādityeṣitavyamiti bhāvaḥ / śubhāśubharūpatayā-sukhaduḥkhajanakatayā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:388: manasi pramāṇāntaramupakṣipati syānmatam iti / atra prayogaḥ- sukhādi sāsamavāyihetukaṃ bhāvakāryatvātkāryarūpādivaditi / asamavāyihetuśca sukhādāvātmamanaḥsaṃyoga eva,
GSP33yaatsi_u:390_0: ātmetyādi bāhyetyādi ca ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ padadvayaṃ bahuvrīhivṛttaṃ sukhāderviśeṣaṇam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:390_2: etannirasyati tadasa dityādinā / sukhe ti / anukūlaviṣayasya pratikūlaviṣayasya ca
GSP33yaatsi_u:390_3: jñānasyaivātmani niyatapūrvavṛtteḥ sukhe duḥkhe ca kāraṇasya tatrāsamavāyihetutvaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:390_5: eva ca tattajjñāne 'samavāyikāraṇam / kṛtisādhyatājñānameva prayatne tathā cikīrṣādvārā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:391: anubhavarūpe ca liṅgajñānādi tathā / saṃskāre cānubhavaḥ tathā / prayatna evādṛṣṭasyāpyasamavāyihetuḥ / idamupalakṣaṇam / icchāṃ prati iṣṭajātīyatvasyeṣṭasādhanatvasya vā
GSP33yaatsi_u:392_0: jñānaṃ tathā / dveṣaṃ prati cāniṣṭatvasya tatsādhanatvasya vā jñānaṃ tathā / ātmaviśeṣaguṇānāṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:392_1: kutrāpyasamavāyihetutvaṃ nāstīti pravādastu na śraddheya iti manuditāśayaḥ / icchādīnāmityādipadena
GSP33yaatsi_u:393_0: sādhanāntaraṃ manasi śaṅkate yattu nitye ti / atra prayogaḥ- sukhādirdravyasaṃyogāsamavāyihetukaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:393_3: siddhiriti bhāvaḥ / etaddūṣayati tadapī ti / sthavīyaḥ- sthūlataram / avimṛśyabhāṣitamiti
GSP33yaatsi_u:393_4: yāvat / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ- anvayavyatirekasahacāradarśanādeva hi sarvatra kāraṇatvādhyavasāyaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:393_5: pārthivāṇurūpādau dahanasaṃyogasya hetutvamapi tato dehāvayavādau rūpādiparāvṛtterddaṣṭatvāddṛṣṭānusārādeva
GSP33yaatsi_u:393_6: kalpyate / iha cānukūlajñānādereva sukhādau hetutvaṃ dṛṣṭam / samavāyikāraṇa ātmani
GSP33yaatsi_u:393_8: tathātvena kalpanāvasara iti / dṛṣṭakāraṇe ti / dṛṣṭahetorabhāve 'pi kāryotpatterdarśane
GSP33yaatsi_u:393_9: hi kāraṇāntarakalpanāvasaraḥ / na ca dṛṣṭahetorvyabhicāra ityarthaḥ / ata iti / dṛṣṭahetuṣveva
GSP33yaatsi_u:393_11: dravyāntarasaṃyogasya hetutvakalpanāyāṃ tu kḷptatyāgo 'kḷptaparikalpanā ca / jñānāderasamavāyihetutve
GSP33yaatsi_u:393_13: ihe ti / sukhādau tu tadviparyayaḥ- kāraṇāntaropalambharūpaṃ dṛṣṭāntato vaiṣamyaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:393_15: cārthāntaramityāha evamapī ti / sa tarhī ti / tarhī sa ityanvayaḥ / dṛṣṭānte saḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:394_3: hetutvaṃ dṛṣṭānusārātkalpyam / na tvasparśanityadravyaviśeṣaguṇaṃ pratyapīti vyajyate
GSP33yaatsi_u:394_4: 'nena / evaṃ sukhādāvasamavāyihetutvena dravyāntasaṃyogasya sādhanaṃ na saṃbhavatītyuktam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:395_0: atha tatsādhanābhyupagame 'pi vivakṣitamabhautikaṃ manastattvāntaraṃ na setsyatīti
GSP33yaatsi_u:395_1: prapañcayati / tatra śaṅkā athocyete ti / pratyāsiddham-pratiṣiddham / pāthasīyaṃ-jalīyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:395_2: śakyādhyavasānaṃ-śakyaniścayam / mano na pārthivaṃ taijasādi vā rasāvagamanimittendriyatvādrasanāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:395_3: mano na jalīyaṃ gandhagrāhakendriyatvādghrāṇavaditi bhautikatvaniṣedhaḥ / yugapajjñānānutpattiliṅgenāṇutvena
GSP33yaatsi_u:395_5: pariharati tadanupapanna mityādinā / dharmī ti / manasi pakṣe 'bhimato yo viśeṣo 'bhautikatvarūpaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:396_1: pārthivatvādi ca manasaḥ sādhayediti bhāvaḥ / atra śaṅkate atha śabde ti / rūpādiṣu
GSP33yaatsi_u:396_2: madhye gandhamātragrāhakatvaṃ pārthivatvasādhakam / evaṃ rasamātragrāhakatvādi ca
GSP33yaatsi_u:396_3: jalīyatvādeḥ / tathā ca manasaḥ pārthivatvādisādhakahetorasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ / atrottaraṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:396_4: hanta tarhī ti / yadbhūtaguṇamātragrāhakaṃ yadindriyaṃ tadeva bhūtāntaravyatiriktatvena
GSP33yaatsi_u:397_2: evamabhautikatvānumānaṃ pradūṣya manaso bhautikatvānumānamupasthāpayati api ca śabdādī
GSP33yaatsi_u:398_0: vaditi prayogaḥ / pañcabhūtopādanakatve gauravājjātisāṅkaryabhītyā ca pakṣāntaramāha
GSP33yaatsi_u:398_2: iti bhāvaḥ / asya pārthivatve śrutimapi saṃvādarūpeṇodāharati annamayaṃ hī ti / śruterānyaparyaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:398_3: śaṅkate tanne ti / nanu ityādiḥ / tat- niruktaśrutivacanam / tadadhīne ti / annarasāpyāyitasyaiva
GSP33yaatsi_u:399: vāyuviśeṣasya prāṇasyevāmmayatvaṃ jalarasāpyāyitatvāditi bhāvaḥ / mano 'bhautikatve śrutyarthāpattimapyāha ata eve ti / yadi bhautikaṃ manaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:400_0: tarhi muktau nānuvarteta dehādivaditi / muktau mano 'nuvṛttau śrutimāha tatraive
GSP33yaatsi_u:400_1: ti / chāndogya evāṣṭame prapāṭhake / annamayaṃ hī ti tu ṣaṣṭhe / muktasya manoyogamuktvā
GSP33yaatsi_u:400_2: nityamuktasvabhāvasyeśvarasyāpi tatra pramāṇamudāharati tathe ti / purāṇe-śrīvaiṣṇave
GSP33yaatsi_u:400_3: pañcameṃ'śe / tanne tyādinoktamākṣepamardhāṅgīkāreṇa pariharati ucyate iti / satyamityardhāṅgīkāre /
GSP33yaatsi_u:400_5: vā / vākāro 'nāsthāyām / ata eva svāśayaṃ prakaṭīkaroti manoviṣaye paramārthatastu
GSP33yaatsi_u:400_6: ityādinā / buddhāveve ti / buddhāveva manaḥśabdo vācakatvena vartata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:400_8: tu karmakṛtabuddhivṛttiniṣedhābhiprāyamiti bhāvaḥ / buddhereva manastve laukikavyavahāramuktvā
GSP33yaatsi_u:400_9: laukikapratyakṣamapi pradarśayati manasaḥ iti / manaḥ prasannamityādyadhyakṣaṃ pratyakṣabuddhyālambanameva saṃbhavati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:401_0: na tvatīndriyamanogocaramiti bhāvaḥ / buddhiśabdena jñānaṃ vivakṣitam / nanu buddherjñānasyaiva
GSP33yaatsi_u:401_1: manastve 'ntaḥkaraṇatvoktistasya kathaṃ saṅgacchata ityatrāha evaṃ ce ti / viṣayasmṛtyādihetubhūtavyāpāravattvapradarśanārthaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:402_1: 'pīti bhāvaḥ / atra vimarśakena sukhādisākṣātkārakaraṇatvena manaso 'numānaṃ tārkikābhimataṃ na vimṛṣṭam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:404_0: āhe tyādinā vimarśakenātiriktamanonirāse kṛte siddhāntīsvāśayamāviṣkaroti ucyata
GSP33yaatsi_u:404_2: pravartyata ityāśayaḥ / astu vā muktānāmīśvarasya ca mano buddhirūpameva / baddhānāṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:404_3: tu mana āhaṅkārika mantaḥkaraṇaṃ śrutibalādabhyupagantavyameva / smṛtyādikaraṇatayā
GSP33yaatsi_u:404_4: ca tadabhyupagamārham / paraṃ tu tasya na cetanatvaṃ śakyamadhyavasitumiti hārdam //
GSP33yaatsi_u:405: prāṇātmavādamupakṣipati astu tarhī ti / prāṇavati dehe jīvatīti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:406: tadrahite ca mṛta iti vyavahārātprāṇa eva jīvanakartṛtvājjīva iti bhāvaḥ / itarathe ti / paramamahataḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:408: iti padacchedaḥ / amahattvamaṇutvam / niḥsparśatvādātmani na kriyā vibhutve 'ṇutve vā saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:409: pratikṣipati vādamenam idamapyasa diti / atra prayogatrayam- prāṇo nātmā,
GSP33yaatsi_u:411_1: iti / prāṇavyāpārasya bhuktapītāhārapariṇāmahetutvam ahaṃ vaiśvānaro bhūtvā prāṇināṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:411_2: dehamāsthitaḥ / prāṇāpānasamāyuktaḥ pacāmyannaṃ caturvidham // iti gītāsmṛtisiddham /
GSP33yaatsi_u:411_3: tanutare ti / alpatarapṛthivījalatejoṃśottambhito jaṭharagato vāyuviśeṣaḥ prāṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:417_0: ajaḍatvāt / jaḍatvapratibaddhaṃ hyanātbhyaṃ ghaṭādiṣu dṛṣṭam / jaḍatvaṃ ca saṃvido
GSP33yaatsi_u:417_1: nivartamānaṃ tadapi nivartayati / ajaḍatvaṃ ca saṃvidaḥ sattayaiva prakāśamānatvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:420_0: syānmatam-jātāyāmapi saṃvidi viṣayamātraṃ prathate / na khalunīlamidamiti pratiyantaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:420_1: tadaivānīlamanidaṃrūpamapi saṃvedanaṃ pratīmaḥ / ataḥ svarūpasatyaiva saṃvidā indriyasannikarṣeṇeva
GSP33yaatsi_u:420_2: viṣayaḥ prakāśyate / tataśca tadgatāgantukaprakāśātiśayadarśanena paścāt saṃvidanumāsyate iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:422_0: tanna / jñānavyatirekiṇor'thadharmasya prakāśasya nipuṇamapi nirīkṣamāṇānāṃ rūpādivadanupalabdheḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:424: na jñāyate iti ca kadācitpratibhāsaḥ syāt / nacaivamasti / atītānāgataviṣayagrahaṇasmaraṇeṣu vyāhāravyavahārayorabhāve,
GSP33yaatsi_u:426: tataḥ prāgeva viditatvapratīteḥ nānumānikī tatra viṣaya(prakāśa)
GSP33yaatsi_u:428: natarāṃ tatpūrvikā tatra buddhisiddhiḥ / tathāhi- kenacitpreritaḥ praṇidhāya smṛtvānantarameva prativadati smṛtamadya mayeti / na cāya
GSP33yaatsi_u:430: anyonyāśrayaṇāpatteśca / svavyāhāreṇa svajñānānumānaṃ ka iva nirapatrapaḥ pratijānīta? /
GSP33yaatsi_u:434: na tu tatsaṃbandhanibandhanaḥ / yathā sattāsaṃbandhāt pṛthivyādiṣu sadvyavahāraḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:435_0: rūpasaṃbandhācca cākṣuṣatvaṃ sattāyāṃ rūpe ca / evaṃ saṃvitsaṃbandhātpravartamāno
GSP33yaatsi_u:435_1: ghaṭādiṣu prakāśata iti vyavahāraḥ prakāśamānatvaṃ vā dharmaḥ saṃvidi tu paridṛśyamāno
GSP33yaatsi_u:436: api tu tatsvarūpaprayukta iti svayaṃprakāśatvāt saivā'tmeti / kiñca yo 'pi saṃvido 'nyaṃ saṃveditāramabhyupagacchati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:437: abhyupagacchatyevāsau saṃvidam / nahyasatyāmeva saṃvidi saṃvettītyupapadyate / evaṃ cet,
GSP33yaatsi_u:438: ubhayavādisaṃpratipannatayā saiva varaṃ veditrī bhavatu; kimanyena kalpitena? /
GSP33yaatsi_u:440: nanu ahaṃ jānāmīti jñānātiriktastadāśrayabhūto 'yamātmā pratīyate / satyam ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:441: sa tu vikalparūpatayā sākṣātpratyakṣa iti na śakyaḥ saṃśrayitum / bhedajñānasiddhavatkāreṇa pṛthagvastutayā gṛhītāvyabhicāreṇa sahopalambhaniyamena,
GSP33yaatsi_u:443_0: prakāśasvābhāvye ca saṃvedanatvamityādinā vā prakāśātmano 'hamityaṃśasya tattvameva
GSP33yaatsi_u:444: yathā'huḥ prakaṭāḥ- ” avibhāgo 'pi buddhyātmā viparyāsitadarśanaiḥ / grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittibhedavāniva lakṣyate ” //iti //
GSP33yaatsi_u:445: yathā vā pracchannāḥ- ” śuddhaṃ tattvaṃ prapañcasya na heturanivṛttitaḥ / jñātṛjñeyavibhāgasya māyaiva jananī tataḥ ” //iti //
GSP33yaatsi_u:447: atrāha-kṣaṇabhaṅginī prativiṣayamanyānyā ca saṃviccakāsti / saiva cedātmā,
GSP33yaatsi_u:449: / na ca nīrālambanapratibhābhedamātratayeha samādheyam nirālambanatvapratijñāyāḥ pratyakṣādisaka
GSP33yaatsi_u:450: lapratītibādhitaviṣayatvāt / sādhanasya ca sālambanatve tadaviśeṣādaśeṣaśemuṣīṇāṃ tathātvāpatteḥ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:452: yathārtharavyātisamarthanena ca śāstra iti na vyāvarṇyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:453: ata eva na santānāśrayaṇenāpi pratyabhijñopapādanaṃ sādhīyaḥ / vijñānakṣaṇavyatiriktasya sthāyino 'nusandhāyinaḥ santānasyābhyupagame svasiddhāntatyāgaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:454_1: 'nyasya pratisandhānasaṃbhavaḥ / na ca susadṛśatayā bhedāgrahaṇena pradīpādāviva
GSP33yaatsi_u:454_2: pramātari pratyabhijñābhrāntiḥ / yujyate hi tatraikasyaiva pūrvāparavyaktidarśinaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:454_3: tulyasaṃsthānatayā vyaktīnāṃ bhedamaviduṣaḥ tathā bhramaḥ / iha tu saṃvidvyaktayaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:454_4: parasparavārtānabhijñā niranvayavināśinyaśca sugatamata iti na tāsvekatvabhramasyā'śrayatā
GSP33yaatsi_u:454_5: viṣayatā vā saṃbhavinī / na ca susadṛśatve 'pi anyena kṛtamātmakṛtatayānyo 'nusandhātumalamityāgamāpāyisaṃvitsantānāśrayaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:457: prāgabhāvādyasiddheḥ / tadasiddhiśca tasyāḥ svataḥsiddhatvāt / nahi svataḥsiddhasya prāgabhāvādayaḥ svato 'nyato vā
GSP33yaatsi_u:458: siddhyanti / svayaṃ hi svābhāvamavagamayat sadvā asadvā sādhayet / sattve 'bhāv eva nāstīti kathaṃ sādhayet ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:459: / asattvādeva sādhakasya pakṣāntare natarāṃ sādhakatvamiti na svataḥ tāvattatsiddhiḥ / nāpyanyataḥ ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:460: ananyagocaratvādanu- bhūteḥ / anubhāvyatve ca ghaṭādivadananubhūtitvaprasaṅgāt / ataḥ sā na jāyate / janmābhāvādevetare 'pi bhāvavikārāḥ nirākāryāḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:461: tatpratibaddhatvātteṣām / ata eva nānātvamapi saṃvidi pratyuktam ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:462: utpattimattvavyāpakanivṛttyā tadvyāpyabhūtanānātvasyāpi nivṛttisiddheḥ / nahyajaṃ vibhāgyasti / cetyatvācca bhedetaretarābhāvādayo na taddharmāḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:463_0: rūpādivat / ato 'syā na meyaḥ kaścidapi dharmo 'sti / ato nirdhūtanikhilabhedavikalpanirdharmaprakāśamātraikarasā
GSP33yaatsi_u:463_1: kūṭasthanityā saṃvidevā'tmā paramātmā ca / yathā'ha ” yānubhūtirajāmeyānantātmā ”
GSP33yaatsi_u:464_0: teṣāṃ bhāṣā / yathā'ha tadvārtikakāraḥ- ” parāgarthaprameyeṣu yā phalatvena saṃmatā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:464_1: saṃvit saivaiha meyor'tho vedāntoktipramāṇataḥ // aprāmāṇyaprasaktiśca syādito 'nyārthakalpane /
GSP33yaatsi_u:466_0: tadidamalaukikamavaidikaṃ ca darśanamityātmavidaḥ / tathāhisaṃviditi svāśrayaṃ prati
GSP33yaatsi_u:466_2: saṃvediturātmano dharmaḥ prasiddhaḥ / tathaiva hi sarvaprāṇabhṛtpratyātmasiddho 'yamanubhavaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:466_4: prakāśante / svāpamadamūrcchādaśāsu ca yogyānupalambhanirākṛtaḥ tatsadbhāvo nābhyupagamamarhati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:467: tataḥ prabodhasamaye 'nusamadhāsyata / na cānusandhīyate / ata eva hi 'iyantaṃ kālaṃ na kiñcidahamajñāsiṣa'miti prabuddhaḥ pratyavamṛśati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:468_1: 'pi nityavadasmaraṇamanubhavābhāvameva sādhayati / na ca satyapi saṃvitprakāśe viṣayāvacchedavirahādahaṅkāragocarāpāyādvā tatsmṛtyanudayaḥ ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:469_2: svāpādidaśāsu nidhanamupagata iti śakyo 'bhidhātum / ata eva hi 'iyantaṃ kālamahasvāpsa'miti
GSP33yaatsi_u:469_3: prabodhe parāmarśaḥ / naca nirviṣayā nirāśrayā vā saṃvinnāma kācit saṃbhavati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:471: / na hyakarmakasya jānātyāderakartṛkasya vā prayogo loke vede vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:472: yattu svataḥsiddhasya sattve tadvirodhādeva prāgabhāvādeḥ tadānīmavasthānāsaṃbhavānna tataḥ siddhiriti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:473_0: tadatisthavīyaḥ / nahi saṃvidāsvakālavartina evārthāḥ siddhyantītyasti niyamaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:473_1: atītānāgatayorasaṃvedyatvaprasaṅgāt / atha saṃvitprāgabhāvādeḥ siddhyataḥ tatsamakālatayā bhavitavyamiti;
GSP33yaatsi_u:475: sati tatsiddherna prāgabhāvādyasiddhiḥ / tatprāgabhāvaḥ tatsamakāla ityunmattavacaḥ / aindriyikapratyakṣasvabhāvo hyayaṃ svasamakālapadārthaprakāśakatvaṃ nāma / na jñānamātrasya,
GSP33yaatsi_u:476_0: pramāṇamātrasya vā / etena tadapi parākṛtam- ” mānaṃ svayaṃprakāśatvātsvataḥsaccetsadāstyataḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:476_1: tanmeyaṃ ca sadāstyeva mānaṃ meyayugeva hi ” //iti/ nahi mānasya svasattākāler'thāvinābhāvo
GSP33yaatsi_u:478: atha saṃvitprāgabhāvāderavartamānatayā na pratyakṣatvam / liṅgādyabhāvācca na pramāṇāntarataḥ siddhiriti / yadyevam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:480: bhāvādyasiddheḥ / pramāṇābhāva eva hīdānīṃ vācyaḥ / na ca tadabhāvaḥ śakyo 'bhidhātumityuktameva / yogyānupalabdhyaivābhāvasya samarthitatvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:481: apica pratyakṣasaṃvit svasattākāle svaviṣayasya sadbhāvaṃ sādhayantī yattasya na sarvadā sattāṃ sādhayati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:482_0: tadavasīyate ahamidānīmevāsmi nānyadeti kālaviśeṣāvacchinnaiva sā cakāstīti / itarathā
GSP33yaatsi_u:483_0: na cānyāviṣayatvāt saṃvido 'nyataḥ tatprāgabhāvādyasiddhiḥ / ajñāsiṣamiti prāktanasaṃvido
GSP33yaatsi_u:483_2: parasaṃvidaḥ / tadanabhyupagame ca śabdārthagrahaṇāsaṃbhavena vaidikalaukika samastavyavahārābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:486: svaviṣayasādhanatvaṃ vā hyanubhūtitvam / te ca saṃvidantara viṣayabhāve 'pi svānubhavasiddhe na bhraśyata iti kathamananubhūtitva prasaṅgaḥ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:492: āsthīyatāṃ tarhī ghaṭāderapi asaṃvidāśrayatvājñānāvirodhitvayoreva tatprayojakatvam / atha te api viṣayatve syātāmiti cet,
GSP33yaatsi_u:495_0: vyabhicarati tadapi prāgabhāve / janmābhāve 'pi tasya vināśadarśanāt / bhāvaviśeṣaṇopādāne
GSP33yaatsi_u:499: yena pāramārthyena viśeṣaṇaṃ sādhyasya sādhanasya vār'thavattāmaśnuvīta / tathāca sati sādhu samarthitaṃ tarkakuśalenetyamanena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:502: ajasyaivātmano dehendriyādibhyo vibhāgasya samarthitatvāt / anāditvenābhyupagatasyājñānasyā'tmano vyatiriktatayāvaśyāśrayaṇīyatvāt / aparamārthaḥ sa vibhāga iti cet,
GSP33yaatsi_u:507: tadapi śāstrānumānādipramāṇasiddhaiḥ svayaṃprakāśatvanityatvādidharmaiḥ svayamabhyupagatairanaikāntikam / na ca te citimātramiti vācyam; tatsiddhāvapi teṣu
GSP33yaatsi_u:508_0: vimatidarśanāt / abhyupagamyaiva hi saṃvidaṃ tadanumeyatvakṣaṇikatvādi pratijānate
GSP33yaatsi_u:508_1: vādinaḥ / svarūpabhedācca / svāśrayaṃ prati sattayaiva kasyacit prakāśanaṃ hi saṃvedanam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:508_2: svayaṃprakāśatā tu sattayaivā'tmane prakāśamānatā / prakāśaśca cidacidaśeṣapadārthasādhāraṇo
GSP33yaatsi_u:508_3: dharma iti saṃvitsiddhāveva sādhitam / tadanabhyupagame tu vyavahārānuguṇyavacanaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:508_4: prakāśaśabdaḥ / nityatā tu sarvakālavartamānatā / ekasaṅkhyāvaccheda ekatvamiti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:508_5: naca jaḍatvakāladeśanānātvādyavaccheda- śūnyatārūpatvātteṣāṃ na yathoktadoṣa iti
GSP33yaatsi_u:509_1: cājñānamātmani dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ ca bhavatām / api cāsyā iti ṣaṣṭhyānubhūteḥ saṃbandhamabhidhāya
GSP33yaatsi_u:510_0: prāṇātmavāde dehātmavādadūṣaṇajātamatidiśannāha nirasta iti / anirasto 'dūṣito hi
GSP33yaatsi_u:510_2: na tu dehātmavādadūṣaṇaireva dūṣito 'satprāya iti bhāvaḥ //9 //
GSP33yaatsi_u:511_0: ātmano gatyanupapattiṃ pariharati avibhutvene ti / vibhutve gatirnopapadyeteti yuktam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:511_1: aṇutve tu manasa iva niḥsparśasyāpi gatirātmana upapadyata eva / na ca sparśasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:511_2: gatau hetutvaṃ prayatnādṛṣṭādipreraṇamantareti bhāvaḥ / parimāṇe ti / etadātmano
GSP33yaatsi_u:512: atra saṃvidātmavādī samuttiṣṭhate bhavatu tarhī ti / saṃvidātmā,
GSP33yaatsi_u:513_0: ajaḍatvāditi prayogaḥ / vyatirekavyāptimāha jaḍatve ti / pratibaddhaṃ-vyāpyam / anātmyam-anātmatvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:513_1: ātmano bhāva ātmyaṃ tasyābhāva iti vyutpatteḥ / vyatirekopanayanigamane āha jaḍatvaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:513_2: ce ti / tadapi-anātmyamapi / vyāpakanivṛttervyāpyanivṛttyākṣepakatvāt vyāpaka jaḍatvanivṛttyā
GSP33yaatsi_u:513_3: vyāpyānātmyanivṛttiḥ siddhyatīti bhāvaḥ / ajaḍatvahetorasiddhiṃ pariharati ajaḍatvaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:513_4: ce ti / svasattāmātrataḥ prakāśamānatvāt parāyattaprakāśatvalakṣaṇajaḍatvābhāva iti
GSP33yaatsi_u:513_5: bhāvaḥ / nahī ti / parāyattasiddhiḥ-parādhīnaprakāśā / jaḍeti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:514_0: atra saṃvidanumeyatvavādināṃ bhāṭṭānāṃ matamanuvadati syānmatam iti / viṣayamātram
GSP33yaatsi_u:514_1: iti / na hi nīlo 'yaṃ ghaṭa iti jñāne jñānasya viṣayatvaṃ saṃbhavati paṭāderiveti
GSP33yaatsi_u:514_2: bhāvaḥ / nanu ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti jñānaprakāśastarhi katham ? tatrāha
GSP33yaatsi_u:515_0: tataśce ti / tataḥ paścāccetyanvayaḥ / castvarthe / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ- jñānādviṣaye jñātatā
GSP33yaatsi_u:515_1: nāma dharmo jāyate / sa eva prakāśa ityucyate / sa eva jñānakṛtor'thasyātiśayo nāma /
GSP33yaatsi_u:515_2: sa ca pratyakṣo jñātuḥ / tena cārthaprakāśarūpaliṅgenātmani taddhetuṃ jñānamanuminoti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:517_0: etadbhāṭṭamataṃ pratikṣipati tanne ti / jñāne ti / jñānaviṣayatā hi jñātatā / tadviṣayatayār'thasaṃbaddhajñānavyatiriktatayā
GSP33yaatsi_u:518_3: kalpakamasiddhamiti bhāvaḥ / arthajñāneṣu jñānasya jñāturahamarthasyātmanaśca niyataṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:518_4: bhānamiti prābhākaraprakriyayā samarthayati vittī ti / jñānajñātranavagāhinyāṃ jñeyapratītāvupagatāyāṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:518_5: jāte 'pi ghaṭajñāne 'haṃ tajjñānavān na veti saṃśayaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:520_1: tathāca svaprakāśatvasiddherjñānasya tata eva viṣayavyavahāravat jñātatāvyavahāro
GSP33yaatsi_u:520_2: 'pi ghaṭata iti nārthāntarajñātatākalpanāvasara iti hārdam / athātītānāgateṣvartheṣu
GSP33yaatsi_u:521_0: samaiva ceyaṃ rītiḥ pratyakṣe 'pītyāśayenā'ha atīte ti / atra grahaṇamanumānādilakṣaṇam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:521_1: vyāhāraḥ-śabdo vyavahāraḥ / vyavahāraḥ kāyikohānopādānādiḥ / ubhau viditatvapratītimūlāvatra
GSP33yaatsi_u:521_3: viditatvapratītestanmūlabhūtāyā udaya iti na tatra vyāhāraliṅgena viditatvamanumāya tato vedanānumā
GSP33yaatsi_u:522: nam / kintu svayaṃprakāśavedanabalādeva viditatvapratītiḥ atha ca tanmūlavyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ / ānumānikī tatra
GSP33yaatsi_u:523_1: viṣayaprakāśasiddhi riti pāṭhe tu anumānapramāṇajanitā viṣayaprakāśānumitirityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:523_2: vyavahārātpūrvameva jñātatvapratītiṃ smṛtisthale udāharati kenaci diti / smaraṇenaivārthasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:523_3: smṛtatvamavabuddhya vyāharati smṛtamadya maye ti / yadi laiṅgikī smṛtatvapratītiḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:524: tarhyanenaiva vyāhāreṇa liṅgena svasyārthe smṛtatvapratītirānumānikīti vācyam / tatra cānyonyāśrayaṇaṃ prasajyate / smṛtatvapratītyā tadvyavahāraḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:525_0: tenaiva ca sā svasyeti / tathā ca jñānasvaprakāśatvanibandhanaiva jñātatvapratītireṣṭavyeti
GSP33yaatsi_u:525_1: bhāvaḥ / svavyāhāreṇaive ti / nirapatrapa iva ka ityanvayaḥ / nirapatrapaḥ-nirlajjaḥ / svavyāhāreṇa-ahaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:527_2: yāvat / parakīyena parātmano jñānavyavahāreṇa tadanyasya parātmaniṣṭhajñānānumānasaṃbhavāt
GSP33yaatsi_u:527_3: svavyāhāreṇa svajñānānumānam iti nirdiṣṭam / evaṃ jñātatāyā asiddhiḥ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:528: jñāta iti pratītivyavahārayoḥ svaprakāśajñānata evopapatteḥ / jñānasya svaprakāśatvaṃ cajāte jñāne svātmani jñānasaṃśayajñānābhāvaniścayānudayabalāt niśceyamiti varṇitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:529_0: idānīmabhyupagamyāpi viṣayaniṣṭhaṃ dharmāntaraṃ prakāśaṃ tadavaṣṭambhenaiva jñānasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:530: taddhi svasaṃbandhāddhāṭādau cākṣuṣatve hetuḥ svasmin rūpāntarānapekṣataddharmavat;
GSP33yaatsi_u:531: anubhūtiḥ ananyādhīnasvavyavahārā svasaṃbandhādarthāntare vyavahārahetutvāt / yathā sattā / sā hi svasaṃbandhāddhaṭādau saditi vyavahārahetuḥ svīyasadvyavahāre sattāntarā
GSP33yaatsi_u:532: napekṣā iti / ādyaḥ prayogo 'tra jñātatārūpaṃ dharmāntaramabhyupetya,
GSP33yaatsi_u:533_2: tathā ca tasyaivātmatvamityāha svayaṃprakāśatvā diti / atredamākūtam-ātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśatvaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:533_3: tāvat atrāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayañjyotirbhavatī tyādiśrutisiddham / jñānasya svayaṃprakāśatvaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:533_4: ca niruktānumānataḥ / atastasyaivātmatvaṃ nyāyyamiti / saṃvida ātmatve lāghavamapyāha
GSP33yaatsi_u:533_5: kiṃ ce ti / veditrī-jñātṛrūpā ātmeti yāvat / bhavatvi ti loṭū kāmacārābhyanujñāyām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:534: saṃvida ātmatve bādhakamāśaṅkate nanvaham iti / prādhānyādahamarthasyaivātmatvaṃ pratīyate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:535_0: natu dharmatayā bhāsamānāyāḥ saṃvida iti bhāvaḥ / ardhāṅgīkāreṇa pariharati satyam
GSP33yaatsi_u:535_1: iti / jñātṛtvapratītāvupagamaḥ / tatprāmāṇye 'nupagamaḥ / tadaprāmāṇye hetumāha sa
GSP33yaatsi_u:535_2: tu iti / jñātā tu bhedarūpatayā nasākṣāt pratyakṣapramāṇasiddhaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:536: kintu bhrāntisiddhaḥ / svalakṣaṇavastumātrāvagāhi nirvikalpakameva hi pramāṇam / dharmadharmibhāvādikalpitabhedāvagāhi savikalpakaṃ tu
GSP33yaatsi_u:537_0: bhramalakṣaṇamati hārdam / jñātṛbhedapratīteḥ yauktikabādhamapyāha bhedajñāne ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:537_1: siddhavatkāreṇetyasyāgre 'pīti yojyam / apṛthagvastutaye ti pāṭhaḥ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:537_3: prāmāṇyopagamenāpi / saṃvedanānāṃ bhedasya saugataiḥ tattvataḥ iṣyamāṇatvāt / apṛthagvastutayā-abhinnavastutvena sādhyena,
GSP33yaatsi_u:541_0: prakāśasvabhāvatve ca saṃvedanatvamevetyādinā vā saṃvidabhedasādhakena saṃvidbhedavādhakena
GSP33yaatsi_u:541_1: hetunā aprakāśātmanaḥ saṃvidbhinnasya jñāturahamarthasyātmanaḥ tattvaṃ-svarūpaṃ durupagamam-upagantumaśakyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:541_2: tṛtīyāntadvayaṃ durupagamamityanenānvitam / jñātā saṃvidabhinnaḥ saṃvidā sahaivopalabhyamānatvāt
GSP33yaatsi_u:541_3: prakāśasvabhāvatvādvā iti prayogo 'tra bodhyaḥ / yadvā pṛthagvastutayenatvāt syātpāṭhaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:542: prakāśasvābhāvye ca saṃvedanatvamityādinā vā hetunā prakāśātmanaḥ saṃvidabhinnasya siddhyata ātmanaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:545_1: grāhye ti / sahopalambhaniyamāt prakāśasvabhāvye ca saṃvedanatvamityādito vā saṃvidabhinnatvaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:546_0: saṃvidābhāsamātraṃ satyamiti bhāvaḥ / tatra vāsanā doṣa iti prakaṭānāṃ saugatānāṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:546_1: yogācārāṇāṃ pakṣaḥ / anādyavidyā doṣa iti pracchannānāṃ māyāvādinām / grāhyagrāhakavikalpaḥ-jñeyajñātṛbhedaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:547_0: uktārthe prakaṭānāṃ saugatānāṃ saṃmatiṃ pradarśayati avibhogo 'pī ti / buddhirevā'tmā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:547_3: saṃmatimupadarśayati śuddham iti / bheda prapañcasya śuddhaṃ tattvaṃ nopādānam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:547_4: tathā sati paramārthatvāpattyānivṛttiprasaṅgāt / tatastasya prapañcasya māyaiva-vividhavicitramithyārthapratibhāsahetuḥ mithyābhū
GSP33yaatsi_u:548: tānādyavidyaiva jananī upādānamiti kārikārthaḥ / nirviśeṣasanmātraṃ cidrūpaṃ paramārthaḥ / tatrādhiṣṭhāne aparamārthanānābhedapratibhāso māyayeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:549_0: ātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśatvaṃ śrautam / saṃvidastathātvaṃ ca yuktisiddham / tattasyā
GSP33yaatsi_u:549_1: evātmatvam / tadbhinnasya tu sarvasya doṣamūlatvādābhāsamātratvamiti saṃvidātmatvaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:550_0: nityavijñānamātmeti ca / tatra kṣaṇikavijñānātmatvamataṃ prakaṭasaugatānāṃ tāvannirasyati
GSP33yaatsi_u:550_2: ti / kṣaṇarūpāvināśasvabhāvā viṣayabhedena nānā ca saṃvidupalabhyate / tasyāścedātmatvaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:550_3: pratyabhijñādikaṃ nopapadyate / anusandhāturātmanaḥ sthiratva eva tadupapatteriti
GSP33yaatsi_u:550_4: bhāvaḥ / atha pratibhāyā iva nirviṣayatvaṃ pratyabhijñāyāḥ śaṅkate na ca nirālambane
GSP33yaatsi_u:550_5: ti / pratyabhijñā nirviṣayā pratibhātvāt mānasakalpanāvilāsavaditi prayogaḥ / atra
GSP33yaatsi_u:550_8: nātyantāya nirviṣayatvam / anyatra sata evānyatra bhānāt / kvacidyāthārthyasyāpi
GSP33yaatsi_u:550_9: dṛṣṭeriti bhāvaḥ / jñānasāmānyasya nirviṣayakatvamiti pakṣe svapravṛttivyāghātamapyāha
GSP33yaatsi_u:550_10: sādhanasya ce ti / nirviṣayakatvasādhakānumānasya saviṣayakatve tadaviśeṣeṇāśeṣajñānānāṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:550_11: saviṣayakatvaṃsyāt / tasya nirviṣayakatve ca na nirviṣayakatvarūpasādhyasiddhiriti
GSP33yaatsi_u:550_14: kṛtam / śāstre ca nyāyatattāvakhye sarvavijñānayāthārthyasamarthanena kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:550_15: atra pūrvottaramīmāṃsābhāgayorityanena mīmāṃsāyā viṃśatilakṣaṇyā aikaśāstrayaṃ tatpūrvottarabhāgarūpatvaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:551_0: nanu vijñānaṃ dvividhaṃ pravṛttivijñānamālayavijñānaṃ ceti / tatrā'dyaṃ nīlapītādijñānam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:551_2: pratyabhijñopapadyata ityatrāha- ata eve ti / vijñānakṣaṇe ti / vijñānameva kṣaṇo
GSP33yaatsi_u:551_4: sthirasyopagame sarvaṃ kṣaṇikamiti siddhāntatyāgaḥ / prakārāntareṇa jñānavyatiriktajñātrabhyupaga
GSP33yaatsi_u:552: maprasaṅgaśceti bhāvaḥ / anabhyupagama iti / kṣaṇikakramikavijñānasamudāyalakṣaṇaṃ santānaṃ samudāyyanatiriktaṃ cetpratyabhijñānupapattireva,
GSP33yaatsi_u:554: uttarasya cānanubhavitṛtvena pratisandhānāyogāditi bhāvaḥ / atredamanusandheyam-kṣaṇikānāṃ samudāyabhāvo 'pi na ghaṭate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:555_2: santānamiti cenna / vinaṣṭasya kāryakāle 'sata upādānatvāyogāt / pūrvatvamātrasyātiprasaktatvācca /
GSP33yaatsi_u:555_4: pratisandhānaṃ bhramātmakaṃ ghaṭata iti śaṅkate na ci ti / bhrāntirūpā ca pratyabhijñā
GSP33yaatsi_u:555_5: na ghaṭata ityarthaḥ / ghaṭate iti śeṣaḥ / dṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyamupapādayati yujyata iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:555_6: dṛṣṭānte bhinnakālikadīpakalikayoḥ susadṛśayoḥ sākṣātkartā sthiraścetanaḥ prasiddho
GSP33yaatsi_u:555_7: bhrāntibhāktvayogyaḥ / tattatra bhrāntirūpā pratyabhijñā ghaṭate / na ca tathā prakṛte
GSP33yaatsi_u:555_8: saṃvidāṃ draṣṭātiriktaḥ sthiro 'bhyupeyate / ataḥ saṃvidevātmānyenātmanābhedaṃ svātmani
GSP33yaatsi_u:556_0: atra nityātmavādinā kenaciduktaṃ saṃvida āgamāpāyitvādikamamṛṣyamāṇo 'dvaitī pratyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:556_1: taducyate kaścidāhe ti / svasyāsattve grāhakābhāvāt svasya svattve grāhyābhāvāśca
GSP33yaatsi_u:556_4: ca ghaṭādivajjaḍatvaprasaṅgāt / tatpramāṇābhāvātprāgabhāvaḥ saṃvido nāstīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:557_0: tpattivyāpyatvāt / vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyanivṛttiriti bhāvaḥ / ata eve ti / utpattyabhāvādeva
GSP33yaatsi_u:560_0: ajatvādyannaivaṃ tannevaṃ yathā ghaṭa iti vyatirekiprayogaḥ / saṃvidi bhedādiniṣedhe
GSP33yaatsi_u:560_1: dharmapakṣakamanvayi ca pradarśayati cetyatvācce ti / bhedādayo na saṃvidi anubhāvyatvādrūpādivat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:560_6: paramātmā jīvātmā ca / jīvabhedo 'pi kalpita iti bhāvaḥ / uktārthe saṃvādamudāharati
GSP33yaatsi_u:560_9: nānājīvātmarūpā ceti bhāvaḥ / saiva ce ti / na vācyaśaktayeyaṃ vedānteṣu pratipādyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:560_10: avācyaiva satī tātparyavṛttyā teṣu gamyata ityarthaḥ / bhāṣā-paribhāṣā,
GSP33yaatsi_u:561_0: saṅketa iti yāvat / saṅketabalādeva śraddheyatvametanmatasyeti hārdam / vedāntānāmevaṃbhūtāyāṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:561_1: saṃvidyeva tātparyamadvaitavārtikakāravacanena saṃvādayati parāgarthe ti / ghaṭapaṭādiṣu
GSP33yaatsi_u:561_2: parāgartheṣu yā pramāṇajanyām iti #ḥ phalarūpeṣyate tāntrikaiḥ saiva mitirvedānteṣu
GSP33yaatsi_u:561_3: prameyabhūtā / ito 'nyasmin parāgarthe tātparyakalpane ca vedāntānāmaprāmāṇyameva
GSP33yaatsi_u:562: prakrāntaṃ māyāvādimataṃ tāvadvistareṇa pratikṣeptumupakramate tadidam ityādinā / alaukikam-laukikapratyakṣādipramāṇaviruddham,
GSP33yaatsi_u:564_1: bhāvaḥ / saṃvidadvaite parābhimate 'dhyakṣavirodhamādau nirūpayati tathāhī tyādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:565_0: vaṃbhūtaḥ ātmadharmaḥ kaścidviṣayaprakāśakaḥ saṃvicchabdita ityarthaḥ / tasyāsye
GSP33yaatsi_u:565_1: ti / anyadharmatvenānityatvena ca pratyakṣasiddhasyāsya pramāṇaphalasya viṣayavedanasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:565_2: na nityātmasvarūpatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ / pramāṇaphalasya sakarmakasyānubhavasyānityatvaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:565_3: prakārāntareṇa sādhayati svāpe ti / svāpādau sattve yogyatvādvedanasyopalabdhiḥ syāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:565_4: anupalabdheśca na tadā tasya sattvamiti bhāvaḥ / suṣuptikālikaṃ vedanābhāvaṃ suptotthitasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:565_5: parāmarśenāpi draḍhayati ata eva hī ti / nanu saṃvidaḥ svaprakāśatvātsvāpe 'pyastyevopalambhaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:565_6: anubhūtamavaśyaṃ smartavyamiti niyamābhāvācca tadananusandhānaṃ ghaṭate prabodhe /
GSP33yaatsi_u:565_7: iyantaṃ kālaṃ na kiñcidahamavediṣam iti parāmarśastu viṣayaprakāśakatvaviśiṣṭajñānābhāvagocaraḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:565_8: svāpe sato 'pi hi vijñānasya na viṣayaprakāśakatvamiti codyamanūdya pariharati yāva
GSP33yaatsi_u:565_9: diti / niyamābhāve 'pītyantena codyānuvādaḥ / agre parihāraḥ / prāyaṇādeḥ saṃskāravicchedakaratvaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:565_11: na smṛtigocarāḥ // iti / prāyaṇam-maraṇam / nityavat-sārvadikam / yadvā niyamavat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:565_13: saṃvidaḥ svāpe 'prakāśameva sādhayet / svayaṃprakāśasvabhāvāyāśca tasyā aprakāśastadā
GSP33yaatsi_u:565_14: tadabhāvaparyavasanna iti bhāvaḥ / siddhānte tu viṣayaprakāśanavelāyāmeva dharmabhūtajñānasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:565_15: svayaṃprakāśatvopagamāt svāpesato 'pi tasyāprakāśo na kṣatikara iti bodhyam / atra śaṅkate na ca
GSP33yaatsi_u:566_1: jñāturahamarthasya vilayāt / ahamarthopaśliṣṭāyā viṣayānvayavatyā eva saṃvidaḥ saṃskārādhāyakatvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:566_3: na tasya prabodhe 'nusandhānaprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ / atrottaramāha arthāntare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:566_5: 'pi yathāyathaṃ tattadanubhavasyaiva tattatsaṃskāraṃ prati hetutvādekāgratayā saṃvidanubhave
GSP33yaatsi_u:566_7: durvāro bhavanmate prabodhasamaya iti bhāvaḥ / nanu jñāturvinaṣṭatvātsvāpekaḥ smaredityatrāha
GSP33yaatsi_u:566_8: na ca pratyabhijñe ti / pūrvadine kṛtasyāparadine pratisandhānātpūrvāparadinasthāyitvena
GSP33yaatsi_u:566_9: sidhyato jñāturahamarthasya madhyakāle svāpe vilayo na ghaṭata iti bhāvaḥ / evaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:567_0: sadbhāvamupapādya tadā tadbhānamapi vartata ityupapādayati ata eva hī ti / svāpakālikāhamarthapratisandhānamidaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:568: tathā cedaṃ na svāpe 'hamarthaprakāśasyopapādakamiti vācyam / svāpāṃśe 'numitilakṣaṇatve 'pi ahamarthe pratisandhānarūpatvasya prātastatrāhaṃ (na)
GSP33yaatsi_u:569: āsa mityādāviva svarasasiddhasyānapodyatvāt / prātaḥkālānubhūtātmasvarūpa- parāmarśitvādasyātmasvarūpe pratisandhānarūpatvopapattiryathā,
GSP33yaatsi_u:570_1: bhāvaḥ / na ca nityātmaprakāśasya saṃskārajanakatve mānābhāvātkathamahamartha ātmani
GSP33yaatsi_u:570_3: ekahetutvanirvāhāya nityānubhavasyāpi saṃskārahetutvopagamāt / spaṣṭaṃ cedaṃ siddhāntasiddhāñcane /
GSP33yaatsi_u:570_5: nanu saviṣayajñānasya nityatvaṃ māstu śuddhasaṃvido nityatvādyupapannamevetyatrāha
GSP33yaatsi_u:570_6: na ca nirviṣaye ti / svayaṃprakāśasaṃvidanubhavo hi viṣayāśrayopaśliṣṭasaṃvidviṣaya
GSP33yaatsi_u:570_7: eva lokaviditaḥ idamahaṃ jānāmī ti / kevalasaṃvidanubhavastu na kasyāpi svato 'nyato
GSP33yaatsi_u:570_8: vā prasiddha iti bhāvaḥ / nanu siddhānte jñānasvarūpasyātmano nirviṣayatvaṃ nirāśrayatvaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:571_0: / ucyate / saṃvidādiśabdānāṃ saviṣayakajñāna eva rūḍhatvāttadarthasya nirviṣayatvādiniṣedhoktirupapannaiva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:571_1: dharmabhūtasya jñānasya ca viṣayaprakāśakasya na nirāśrayatvaṃ nityātmasvarūpāśritatvāt /ātmasvarūpajñānasyāpi

GSP33yaatsi_u:577_2: evāsmābhiḥ saṃvitprāgabhāvāsiddhirucyata iti cettatrāha aindriyike ti / laukikapratyakṣa

GSP33yaatsi_u:597_5: viśiṣṭasya tasyānityatvapratītiḥ / antaḥkaraṇāvacchinnaṃ tadeva jñātrityapi parāstam /

GSP33yaatsi_u:598_1: 'nuvidhīyate / tadasya harati prajñām tenāsyakṣarati prajñā ityādiṣu manaindriyadvārakajñānaprasaraṇata
GSP33yaatsi_u:599: evārthaprakāśavyavasthāpanāt / kvacitprajñāmanasorabhedopadeśastu jñānavyāpārānuguṇavyāpāravattvānmanaso bhākto jñeyaḥ / na dvitīyaḥ,

GSP33yaatsi_u:605_3: jñānāntareṇa bhāsamānatve 'pi tasyā na niruktānubhūtitvabhaṅgaprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /

GSP33yaatsi_u:623_6: nityatvādīti bhāvaḥ / saṃvidī ti / virodhidharmavattābodhanamantarā jaḍatvādiniṣedhakatvānupapattiḥ pratijñāyāḥ ;

GSP33yaatsi_u:625_3: api ce ti / pratyayānāṃ prakṛtyarthānvitasvārthabodhakatvavyutpatteḥ cito vibhaktyarthasaṃbandhitvaṃ

GSP33yaatsi_u:631: tadevaṃ vyomāravindasadṛśavapuṣi yathoditadṛśi vedāntatātparyavarṇanaṃ vedāntāyaiva syāt /

GSP33yaatsi_u:643: hantaivaṃ varamito 'tattvaveditvam; bhrāntyāpi hi tatra bahu bhadraṃ paśyatīti /

GSP33yaatsi_u:644_4: pramātuḥ ahaṃpratyayinaḥ pṛthaktvam / tathehāpi pramāturahamarthādvilakṣaṇaḥ sākṣī

GSP33yaatsi_u:762_4: iti maharṣiṇā vāsiṣṭhanandanena / naca jñaptimātra pratibhāsaḥ kasyacit śarīre 'sti /

GSP33yaatsi_u:768_3: svatastvānupagame svatastvameṣṭavyam / anyathā tu jāte 'pi prāmāṇyaniścaye 'prāmāṇyaśaṅkā
GSP33yaatsi_u:768_4: nirargalaprasarā bhavedeva / niṣkampapravṛttiśca kutrāpi na ghaṭeteti bhāvaḥ / vyakte

GSP33yaatsi_u:768_6: vyañjakastvālokādireva / vyaktervyañjakatvamapi na saṃpratipannamiti bhāvaḥ / darpaṇādi

GSP33yaatsi_u:769_4: evātmā / na jñāptimātramiti bhāvaḥ / atrāyaṃ prayogaḥ-jñānaṃ nātmā dharmatayā pramitatvādrūpādivaditi /

GSP33yaatsi_u:774_1: ti / ucyeteti śeṣaḥ / tattatparāgarthānubhavitṛtvena sphuṭaṃ jñānajñeyato vivicyā'tmano

GSP33yaatsi_u:775_7: saṃvinmātrasyāpi bhānaṃ bhavatāṃ tadābhimataṃ na siddhyedityarthaḥ / nanu kiñciditi

GSP33yaatsi_u:775_10: na parāmarśa iti bhāvaḥ / parapakṣe pratisandhānavirodhamāha api ce ti / devānāṃ

GSP33yaatsi_u:777_2: bhānamavarjanīyamityāha api ce ti / sākṣāddraṣṭari saṃjñāyām iti sākṣātkartaryeva hi

GSP33yaatsi_u:807_1: 'haṃśabdaḥ / naca sopādhirīśvaro 'ntaryāmī muktaprāpyo vā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ / tathā

GSP33yaatsi_u:807_4: ca ahaṃ bījapradaḥpite ti / ahaṃśabditaṃ jagatkāraṇasvarūpaṃ nājñānopahitaṃ,
